sentences.sContent: As expressions get more complicated the need to reduce the verbosity of type specification gets more compelling.
sentences.sContent_eng: As expressions get more complicated the need to reduce the verbosity of type specification gets more compelling.
sentences.sCn: 当表达式变得更加复杂，减轻类型说明的冗长的要求变得更加迫切。

sentences.sContent: In displaying this letter in such a prominent place, my colleague was seeking to amuse his visitors with its Indian-English verbosity.
sentences.sContent_eng: In displaying this letter in such a prominent place, my colleague was seeking to amuse his visitors with its Indian-English verbosity.
sentences.sCn: 我的同事把这封信挂在这么显眼的位置， 其实是想向展示他的印度式英语的冗长来娱乐客人。

words.tran: 使…变成动词；用言语表达
